rows.label: qev060103_MSG0001
rows.name: Hah! That is AMAZING! It's really just like they said.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0002
rows.name:
Poisons? Pollutants? Toxic wastes? All gone!
Just...POOF![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0003
rows.name:
The business applications are simply MASSIVE!
You can forget about me working another day as a
BLADE, I'll tell you that much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0004
rows.name:
...Hmm? You in the same line of work? 
Or are you out here on some search mission?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0005
rows.name:
Well, I've got surveying this place covered,
so you can hurry up and move along.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_JNK0010
rows.name: Force

rows.label: qev060103_SEL0011
rows.name: Attempt to capture Roselle and rescue Shiraton.

rows.label: qev060103_JNK0020
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev060103_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Roselle why she kidnapped Shiraton.

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0006
rows.name:
Aw, damn! I thought I'd have more time before anyone
caught up to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0007
rows.name:
Even so, this doesn't change anything.
I'm not letting a chance like this slip away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0008
rows.name:
So if you plan on standing in my way,
I'll take care of you here and now![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0009
rows.name: Sorry, but this one's too juicy. I'm not sharing![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0010
rows.name:
And if you came here hoping to steal the golden goose
out from under me, I've got bad news for you...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0011
rows.name:
You're not going to leave this place alive.
I've got too much riding on this![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0012
rows.name:
Looks like I was right to bring the old girl with me.
Let's go, Gold Courage![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0013
rows.name: Un-REAL! You scrapped my Gold Courage![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0014
rows.name:
Do you have ANY idea how much money I sank into
customizing her?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0015
rows.name: *fsssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0016
rows.name: Phew! Devoltanization complete. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0017
rows.name: Er, is something wrong? What is everyone doing here?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0018
rows.name:
*fsssh* Ah! Have you come here with the voltant you
collected for me?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0019
rows.name:
Oh, this is an excellent sampling! Just lovely. *fsssh*
And it's nice of you to bring it all this way.
Thank you so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0020
rows.name:
...What's that? You came to rescue me? *fsssh*
From Roselle? *fsssh* A kidnapping?! *fsssssssssssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0021
rows.name:
No, there's no kidnapping here! Perish the thought!
True, we had a bit of a misunderstanding at the start,
but no. Everything is fine. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0022
rows.name: She treated me to a huge supply of excellent voltant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0023
rows.name:
It was really most generous of her. *fsssh*
No, Roselle is a dear friend.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0024
rows.name: Ha! Ha ha ha! Man, what a space cadet.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0025
rows.name:
Though, uh, you heard the guy! No kidnapping here!
...Think we can pretend this never happened?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0026
rows.name:
I'm sorry for attacking you out of nowhere like that.
That was totally my bad. Look, I'll even let you in
on a piece of the jackpot if you forget it, okay?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0027
rows.name: So we have a deal? ...Please?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_JNK0110
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev060103_SEL0111
rows.name:
Tell Roselle you're reporting her
to BLADE on charges of kidnapping.

rows.label: qev060103_JNK0120
rows.name: Consider

rows.label: qev060103_SEL0121
rows.name: Tell Roselle that it depends on what the jackpot is.

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0028
rows.name: I'm glad you asked![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0029
rows.name:
So New LA produces more hazardous stuff than it can
deal with. It's what the Zaruboggan call "voltant,"
though it's basically just random toxic garbage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0030
rows.name:
Anyway, people pay good money for someone to come
take care of it for them. Really good money.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0031
rows.name:
So we charge them a fortune, collect up the stuff,
get the Zaruboggan to deal with it for free,
and BOOM! Profit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0032
rows.name: It's perfect, right? Guaranteed to make a fortune![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0033
rows.name:
I grabbed this guy so I could get him to process a big
pile of the stuff.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0034
rows.name:
But that was super wrong of me. I get that now.
I promise not to be so forceful next time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0035
rows.name:
From here on, this is an aboveboard business
and he's an official employee. ...So what do you say?
Let me off the hook this once?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0036
rows.name:
I'll make it worth your while! There's good money in
turning a blind eye every now and again, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_JNK0130
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: qev060103_SEL0131
rows.name:
Tell Roselle you're reporting her
to BLADE on charges of kidnapping.

rows.label: qev060103_JNK0140
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev060103_SEL0141
rows.name: Accept the money and go along with Roselle.

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0037
rows.name:
Glad to see you're a reasonable kind of [ST:gender p1=guy p2=gal ].
Welp, here you go! All yours.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0038
rows.name:
Once we're rolling in dough, I'll rent out the fanciest
spot in New LA for the two of us so we can drink the
night away![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0039
rows.name: Shiraton, I'm sorry for being rough with you before.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0040
rows.name:
What do you say to doing proper business together
from now on? Everything aboveboard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0041
rows.name:
I don't know what board you mean. *fsssh*
...Or what "business" is, for that matter.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0042
rows.name:
But if you are willing to help us in our new initiative,
that would be most welcome. *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0043
rows.name:
It's a deal then! As of now, you and I are officially
business partners.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0044
rows.name:
How about we talk through what comes next on the
walk back to the city?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0045
rows.name: Hey, I think we're headed back ahead of you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0046
rows.name:
But if you ever find yourself with some dicey stuff you
don't know how to get rid of, you know who to call.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0047
rows.name: *sigh* I guess this is where this ride ends...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0048
rows.name:
All right, fine. At least let me turn myself in.
Maybe it'll help lighten my sentence a little.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0049
rows.name:
Ugh, and it was so close I could taste it.
Using these guys to build a company...
Making fat stacks...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0050
rows.name:
I would have had a harem of guys clamoring for my
affections! Man, this sucks.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0051
rows.name:
Has there been some problem here? *fsssh*
I suppose you humans have your share of troubles.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0052
rows.name:
*fsssh* In any case, the new initiative is off to a
great start.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0053
rows.name:
New LA has a lot of voltant to give, and I aim to be
there to devoltanize the lot of it! *fsssh*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0054
rows.name: Thanks for your cooperation.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev060103_MSG0055
rows.name:
I'm going to head back to the city. *fsssh*
Maybe I'll see you there.[ST:wait ]
